title: Sustainable Landscape Design
intro: Holistic master planning that considers drainage, shade, ecology, and lifestyle. A roadmap for your perfect outdoor sanctuary.
highlights: Full-property master plans (front and back yard)
Rainwater harvesting and passive water management
Phased installation plans to spread budget over time
HOA-compliant designs that still prioritize sustainability

avgCost.notes: Design-only fees. Often credited back if you proceed with installation through the same team.

faqs.q: What do I get with a design package?
faqs.a: Typically, you receive a scaled site plan, plant palette with photos, material suggestions, and sometimes 3D perspective views.

faqs.q: Can I implement the design in phases?
faqs.a: Yes! A master plan is perfect for this. Pros can design the whole property and then build it out zone by zone as your budget allows.
